BusinessLogic

Class GDA

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • BusinessLogic.GDA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class GDA
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    A representation of what nutrients a user needs each day.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GDA

        public GDA(Person p)
        Constructs the GDA model for a user. Calculates each as a ratio of calories and converts to grams.
        Parameters:
        p - takes in a user.

        Overrides:

      • findTDEE

        public double findTDEE(Person p)
        Calculates the user's Body Mass Ration (B.M.R). This is a calculation that works with attributes from Person class. After B.M.R is calculate then depending on the user's exercise level the calories consumed in a day is calculated.
        Parameters:
        p - Takes in a person.
        Returns:
        The amount of calories a Person consumes in a day.

      • toGrams

        public double toGrams(double x)
        Formats the ratios from calories to convert them to grams then round them to 2 decimal places.
        Parameters:
        x - The ratio of calories that needs to be formatted.
        Returns:
        The formatted version.

      • toKcal

        public double toKcal(double x)
        Formats the calories to round to 2 decimal places.
        Parameters:
        x -
        Returns:
        The rounded result.
